name: Elevate
description:
Elevate is a simple and very short puzzle-platformer where you can't jump. You have to navigate the levels by changing the landscape.

Arrows - navigate

A - action

Developed in GameMaker: Studio for GBJam 5.

art / code / design

kamil bazydlo | @beechbone
